GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_status

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit b856ce5f4b55f752144baf17e9d5c415072652c5. For more details please see the references link.
